Header: SRI LANKANS NOT BANNED ENTRY INTO USA
Content: The US Embassy in Colombo confirmed stating that ““Sri Lanka is not among the seven countries listed in the recent Executive Order suspending entry into the US", a day after some foreign media reported that Sri Lankans are among those stranded passengers at airports in USA due to President Donald Trump’s ban on immigration. President Trump signed an Executive Order temporarily suspending entrants from seven countries to USA. The seven countries where immigrants are temporarily suspended entry into USA are Iraq, Iran, Syria, Somalia, Libya, Sudan and Yemen under section 212(f) of the Immigration and Nationality Act.
